body.p: Send a 'POST' request to the method end point with these parameters in a JSON body:

stentry.p: ID of the memory where the search should be performed.

strow.stentry: Integer value indicating the lowest similarity percentage to include in results.
Boolean value indicating whether the search should be case sensitive or not.

body.p: The server responds with a JSON object containing two fields.
On success, field 'status' is set to 'OK' and field 'process' contains the ID of the background import process that was initiated.
On error, field 'status' is set to 'failed' and field 'reason' contains the error cause.
After starting the import process, monitor its status using the method.
On successful completion, the result will contain an array of similar segments in the data field.
